Header.title: give it to me straight
Header.paragraph: uncover political bias hiding in text

About.paragraph: Politics is omnipresent in our hometown of Washington DC. The divide between left and right appears deeper than ever and many fear the body politic is broken. We disagree. At the nexus of artificial intelligence and public political data, we saw an opportunity. We sought to use state of the art tools to expose political bias in text. No longer can members of the media sneak a slanted political agenda into their stories. They will have to give it to me straight.
